content: @Alexander Regueiro regarding the issue of escaping lifetimes in impl trait, I have no immediate plans to do anything about it, but it seems clear the current rules are too limiting. I feel like we ought to be able to accept that code but I have to re-read and try to remember what I had in mind :)
@nikomatsakis yeah... it's a little problematic. do let me know your thoughts whenever you have time to review the issue. :-)
@nikomatsakis I think https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/42940 and https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/51069 are closely related, but I don't know if they're exactly the same thing.
